import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { defaultPostImage} from '../../constants/constants' import classes from './Post.module.css' const Posts = ({post}) => { const img = post.picture ? post.picture : defaultPostImage return (
{post.title}
{new Date(post.createdAt).toDateString()}

{post.description}

) } export default Posts /** * * */
